name: Arcologies — Symmetry Beyond (Cassette Session)
description:
90s/Y2K-inspired atmospheric rollerz and breakz for your mind and soul.

This is NOT AI music. These tunes were built the old way: hardware samplers, synths, mixers, dusty DAWs and a cassette deck. Many of the tracks were arranged in Renoise, bounced through outboard mixers, and the full session was recorded straight to tape.

Full cassette tracklist:
00:00:00 — delta waves
00:08:00 — crystal stasis
00:16:11 — synaptic transfer
00:23:58 — oblivion
00:28:17 — the amulet
00:33:10 — monsoon
00:35:35 — searcher
00:43:53 — three days later
00:52:25 — symmetry beyond
00:59:05 — visual memory unit
01:04:56 — the city at night (outro)

Production notes:
• delta waves — renoise + korg modwave
  Deep-stage IV sleep brainwaves translated into rolling breaks and low-frequency drift.

• crystal stasis — renoise
  Named after the crystalized fate of a l’Cie in Final Fantasy XIII — frozen in time between focus and oblivion.

• synaptic transfer — renoise + soundtracs topaz 14-4
  Shared dreamlines and cross-wired memories; think experimental neuroscience, LSD, and fringe sci-fi.

• oblivion — polyend tracker
  A timeless drift into the void; tracker grooves carved directly into a cassette haze.

• the amulet — roland sp-808
  A relic that opens portals and tears in space — the Eye of Hades patched through vinyl-style FX.

• monsoon — renoise + korg opsix
  Arizona dust storms, beautiful and dangerous — harmonic FM textures over thick atmospheric pressure.

• searcher — renoise + soundcraft spirit 12
  Always hunting the ultimate ride; a bodhisattva on the breaks, delaying nirvana to bring others along.

• three days later — renoise + soundtracs topaz 14-4
  A title card flickers: “Three Days Later”. Max Cherry, Jackie Brown, late-night plans and quiet tension.

• symmetry beyond — ibook g3 + logic 4 / exs24
  Patterns that loop, reflect and rotate — hinting at something just past perfect symmetry.

• visual memory unit — renoise + mackie 1202
  A Sega Dreamcast VMU glitching in the corner of your eye, saving fragments of lives and high scores.

• the city at night (outro) — renoise
  When the city finally goes quiet, you can hear the concrete nature breathing.

Some of these tracks can also be found on [OMNI139] Arcologies — Symmetry Beyond, but this NFT represents the full cassette-style session as heard on the YouTube upload.

attributes.value: delta waves, crystal stasis, synaptic transfer, symmetry beyond
Korg modwave, Korg opsix, Polyend Tracker, Roland SP-808, iBook G3 + Logic 4
